definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The spectrometer has been equipped with an axial plasma torch and a rotary spray chamber.
sentences.chinese: 光谱仪配有端视等离子体炬和旋流雾室进样装置。

sentences.english: A part of polymeric deposit can be reconverted into methane and acetylene by hydrogen plasma.
sentences.chinese: 积炭能够与氢气等离子体反应转化成甲烷和乙炔。

sentences.english: A shower of plasma followed by a shower of glass from exploding light bulbs.
sentences.chinese: 电灯泡爆炸后，与玻璃碎渣一同四溅的是等离子体。

sentences.english: Finally, the optimal electron collision frequency of the non-magnetized plasma is presented.
sentences.chinese: 最后，给出了非磁化等离子体的最佳碰撞频率。

sentences.english: The mechanism and accomplishment method of PET bottle treated with plasma are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍等离子体处理聚酯瓶的机理及处理的方法。

sentences.english: This paper investigates the stealth of target by nonuniform unmagnetized plasmas.
sentences.chinese: 研究了不均匀非磁化等离子体片的目标隐身。

sentences.english: The degradation of Fuchsin acid in aqueous solution by contact glow discharge electrolysis is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了接触辉光放电等离子体降解水体中的酸性品红。

sentences.english: Frequency downshift and upshift of microwaves reflected by laser-induced plasma were detected in the experiments.
sentences.chinese: 研究了微波被激光等离子体反射时反射波的频率变化。

sentences.english: The plasma flows in a loop along a magnetic field line.
sentences.chinese: 这些等离子体沿着磁力线的方向流动喷发。

sentences.english: Using spline collocation method to solve plasma tearing mode equations numerically is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 采用样条配置法数值求解环流器等离子体撕裂模方程。

sentences.english: Plasma recondensation on the substrate and growing thin films.
sentences.chinese: 等离子体中粒子在基片上生长薄膜。

sentences.english: Keshe: So what has happened is that the plasmas become closer.
sentences.chinese: 已经发生的是等离子体变成紧密。

sentences.english: Pure Fe nanopowders were prepared successfully by method of anodic arc discharging plasma.
sentences.chinese: 采用阳极弧放电等离子体制备了高纯铁纳米粉末。

sentences.english: Deep penetration laser welding is associated with violent plasma generation characterized by high charge densities.
sentences.chinese: 激光深熔焊接时伴随着高电量等离子体的产生。

sentences.english: Different kinds of plasma sheaths in gas discharge.
sentences.chinese: 气体放电中的各种等离子体鞘层。

sentences.english: A novel type of unsymmetrical shadow mask plasma display panel (SMPDP) has been successfully developed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了一种新颖的不对称荫罩式等离子体显示板。
